headline: Abaxx Calls Warrants, Provides Corporate Update
summary: TORONTO, Dec. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Abaxx Technologies Inc. headline: What Rising Targets And New Products Mean For Cboe Global Markets Valuation Narrative
summary: Cboe Global Markets stock has seen a modest uptick in its fair value estimate to about $262 from roughly $256, as analysts factor in slightly stronger long term earnings potential. This shift reflects a marginally lower discount rate of about 8.24% from roughly 8.24% and a small improvement in long term revenue growth assumptions to around negative 16.6% from roughly negative 16.6%, in line with street research that remains broadly constructive on the durability of Cboe's trading,...
